post.body: Don't you have Comcast?
Congrats, my friend.
It just started snowing here at the office. We have a parking ban in Salem today.
I think it turned out okay (it's still cooling), but it made a HUGE mess on my stovetop. I'll be scrubbing for days.
BTW, my caramels were a hit. It might have been worth the hassle of dipping them in chocolate.
Home, safe and sound. Time for bed.
Happy New Year!
I'm at North Station (130 Causeway St, Boston, MA 02114, USA) - http://bkite.com/03n6Q
New Years Eve. On the train to the city. Running late. Going dark a while to save battery life.
Just woke up from a nice little nap. Reggie is now informing me that it's time for his supper.
Taking the train into the city for a party tonight. Just popped the first little bottle of bubbly, Cava.
New blog entry! The T gets it right http://u.mavrev.com/0h2h
Car parked at the T station, and then I walked back in the snow. That SUCKED.
I'm at I-95 & Yankee Division Hwy, Peabody, MA 00, United States - http://bkite.com/03mnR
I'm at I-95 & Parker Rd, Wakefield, MA 00, United States - http://bkite.com/03mmi
I'm at I-95 & I-93, Woburn, MA 00, United States - http://bkite.com/03mkO
Driving in white-out conditions.
Snow! http://twitpic.com/y9oy
New blog entry! 2008 in Review http://is.gd/ehRc
So far, they're looking pretty good. I just have to let them cool for another hour or so before I do the chocolate and sea salt on them.
